twittercache 0.1.0

Reference

Core functions

register_token()

Register a Twitter authentication token with twittercache

request()

Add users to the request queue

sample_twitter_graph()

Robustly sample the twitter graph

get_network_as_tidygraph()

Get the cached graph as a tidygraph

Managing requests

clear_requests()

Empty the request queue

get_requests()

Get screen names from the request queue

get_number_of_requests()

Get the number of users in the request queue

request()

Add users to the request queue

Managing failures

clear_failures()

Empty the failure log

get_failures()

Get screen names from the failure log

get_number_of_failures()

Get the number of users in the failure log

rerequest_failures()

Re-request users in the failure log

Managing tokens

check_rate_limits()

Check rate limits for registered tokens

clear_tokens()

Remove all registered tokens from the cache

get_number_of_tokens()

Check how many tokens are in your cache

register_token()

Register a Twitter authentication token with twittercache

Managing user data

clean_cache()

Remove suspended and deleted accounts from the cache

clear_cache()

Remove all sampled users from the cache

export_cache()

Export the cache

import_cache()

Import the cache

user_in_cache()

Check if a user is in the cache
